name: Blood Barnacle
description: The Blood Barnacle is a tiny, insidious beast resembling a normal barnacle while motionless, capable of blending seamlessly into its surroundings. It has a small, unassuming body and can attach to its prey.
memorable: The unique ability to infect and sap the strength of its victims through the Barnacle Shivers disease makes it a persistent threat, capable of leading to zombification.
goals: To infect and drain the life force of nearby living creatures.
relations: Related to other parasitic creatures and may be found in aquatic environments alongside larger sea life.
environment: Commonly found in water bodies, particularly in coastal areas or locations with marine life.
strengths: Impressive swimming speed and the ability to detect living creatures by scent up to a mile away.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, making it susceptible to specific types of attacks.
attacks: Uses a bite attack that attaches to its target, causing continued blood loss and the potential for contracting disease.
most_powerful_ability: Barnacle Shivers disease, which can incapacitate its prey by preventing them from regaining hit points and ultimately leading to their zombification.
senses: Possesses blindsight, allowing it to sense creatures within 60 feet while being blind beyond that range.
skills: Has an average perception skill, allowing it to notice details in its environment.
additional_information: Can detect the general direction of creatures within a mile using Blood Sense.
Ability to protect itself through the Host Defense reaction.
Disease can be fatal, leading to the creation of a zombie ally.
Effectively ambushes prey by utilizing its False Appearance ability.
